TEXT.TITLE: APPLIED SOLAR ENERGY CORP <SOLR> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr profit nine cts vs loss 30 cts Net profit 317,000 vs loss 997,000 Sales 6,338,000 vs 3,119,000 Note: 1986 net includes extraordinary gain of 90,000 dlrs, or two cts per shr. Reuter
